conbody.p: is a certified distribution of Cloud Foundry.

uses contaiVners for bundling all major functions, for representing roles and for providing simple update and upgrade workflows. It also uses Consul for centralized configuration storage that runs on each instance.

ul.li: If you have worked with Cloud Foundry before, will allow you to work in a familiar environment that uses Terraform, a service management command-line tool, instead of BOSH.
If you have worked with the HP Helion Development Platform before, will allow you to work in a familiar environment that uses gato, a new command-line administration utility, instead of kato.
